summary: I'm Striking
body:
I’m Striking

I know I’m not a big blog, but this harassing Dan has to stop. I’m not going to post anymore until the phandom chills out. Dan is focusing on himself for once in his life and we can’t leave him alone. I am ashamed to call myself a member of the phandom. I ask other blogs to do the same if we don’t post or reblog demon phanies stuff then they will stop. If we don’t post at all maybe they will realize we aren’t going to be a part of this load of toxic crap anymore.

summary: “Why is Phil losing subs even though he’s uploading pretty regularly now?”
body:
“Why is Phil losing subs even though he’s uploading pretty regularly now?”

I see so many opinions like this nowadays so I wanted to chime in. IMO here’s how it goes:

youtuber: *takes month-long break*
subscriber: *kinda forgets about the channel*

youtuber: *comes back with new video*
subsciber: Ooh, this guy’s still alive?

youtuber: *uploads another new video*
subscriber: Hm I guess I didn’t really miss their uploads *scrolls past without watching*

youtuber: *uploads another new video*
subscriber: You know what I don’t really care any more I want to keep my feed curated *hits unsubscribe button; scrolls past without second thoughts*

It’s not that people are evil and don’t want Phil to be a successful youtuber. It’s just, some people moved on in the mean time and aren’t interested in new videos any more. It’s not a unique phenomenon. This sort of thing happens all the time when a youtuber doesn’t upload a lot then comes back (not to mention Phil’s new upload “schedule” is still all over the place). If you’re a more loyal subscriber there’s no need to be sad about it or shit on other people for unsubbing. No one’s at fault, it’s just how things work.

This just randomly popped into my head so I made it. I know that it’s probably unoriginal so please don’t reblog this saying that I stole it because I honestly didn’t mean to. Hopefully you can read it well enough.

summary: Hearing “interrupted by fireworks” still always makes me want to fucking cry and it’s a kind of?? Physical pain. I love the Dan...
body: Hearing “interrupted by fireworks” still always makes me want to fucking cry and it’s a kind of?? Physical pain. I love the Dan and Phil who we have now because they’ve grown so much but sometimes when it’s real late and I see those “Phan compilations” from 2015 I just have this deep nostalgia for the early Dan and Phil from when they were one of the most relevant duos on YouTube and active all the time and did live-streams constantly. Now that dans on a hiatus and Phil (we have to admit) isn’t getting as many views, I’m so scared that we’re gonna lose them for some reason?? I know they won’t leave and they love YouTube but… it’s just the music and my 1am feelings ig.

Now that dans on a hiatus and Phil (we have to admit) isn’t getting as many views, I’m so scared that we’re gonna lose them for some reason?? I know they won’t leave and they love YouTube but… it’s just the music and my 1am feelings ig.

I love the Dan and Phil who we have now because they’ve grown so much but sometimes when it’s real late and I see those “Phan compilations” from 2015 I just have this deep nostalgia for the early Dan and Phil from when they were one of the most relevant duos on YouTube and active all the time and did live-streams constantly. Now that dans on a hiatus and Phil (we have to admit) isn’t getting as many views, I’m so scared that we’re gonna lose them for some reason?? I know they won’t leave and they love YouTube but… it’s just the music and my 1am feelings ig.

I know they won’t leave and they love YouTube but… it’s just the music and my 1am feelings ig.
